products.name: Semoule de couscous
products.facts: ["Semoule de couscous is made from durum wheat, which is high in protein and gluten, making it ideal for pasta and couscous production.","It is often produced using traditional methods that involve steaming and drying, which can be more environmentally friendly compared to industrial processes.","Couscous is a staple food in many North African countries, and its production supports local agriculture and economies.","High-quality semoule de couscous has a fine texture and a pale yellow color, indicating it is made from well-milled durum wheat without additives."]

products.name: Decaf roast coffee
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Coffees
products.facts: ["Decaf roast coffee is made from coffee beans that have had at least 97% of their caffeine removed through various decaffeination processes.","Many decaf coffees are sourced from organic farms, promoting sustainable agriculture and reducing chemical use.","The quality of decaf roast coffee can be comparable to regular coffee, with a wide range of flavors and aromas available, depending on the bean origin and roasting technique.","Decaffeination methods, such as the Swiss Water Process, use water and natural filtration to remove caffeine, minimizing environmental impact and preserving flavor."]

products.name: Kopiccino
products.facts: ["Kopiccino is made from 100% natural ingredients, including high-quality coffee and plant-based additives.","The packaging is eco-friendly and fully recyclable, reducing environmental impact.","Kopiccino is sourced from sustainable farms that practice ethical farming methods.","It is free from artificial preservatives and additives, ensuring a high-quality product."]

products.facts: ["BelVita Breakfast Snack Blueberry is made with whole grains, providing a good source of fiber.","The packaging is designed to be recyclable, promoting eco-friendly disposal.","BelVita snacks are made without artificial flavors or preservatives, ensuring quality ingredients.","The product is low in sodium, making it a healthier breakfast option."]

products.facts: ["Fridge Pot Tuna Steak is typically made from sustainably sourced tuna, ensuring responsible fishing practices.","The packaging is often recyclable, minimizing environmental impact and promoting eco-friendly disposal.","High in protein and omega-3 fatty acids, Fridge Pot Tuna Steak offers a nutritious option for consumers.","Quality control measures are in place to ensure that the tuna is fresh and free from harmful additives or preservatives."]

products.name: Nature Bakes
products.facts: ["Nature Bakes are made with 100% natural ingredients, ensuring no artificial additives or preservatives.","The packaging is eco-friendly and recyclable, minimizing environmental impact.","Nature Bakes sources ingredients from sustainable farms, promoting biodiversity and responsible agriculture.","The product is free from gluten and dairy, catering to various dietary needs while maintaining high quality."]
